constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 121 (Thursday, July 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. O'HALLERAN:
H.R. 8475.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18, section 8 of article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H7067]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Foreign Agriculture.

title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to provide emergency relief to producers of livestock with herds adversely affected by Mexican gray wolves, and for other purposes.
